name: Para Bellum - Frontlines
description:
Dive into instant tactical action alone, or with friends! Para Bellum - Frontlines, combines fast paced old school military shooter action with modern tactical shooter gameplay. Para Bellum - Frontlines is in active development and this is the first public demo of the upcoming game, which features for example:

  • LAN/Online (direct connection) co-op gameplay
  • Fast paced instant action
  •  Intricate medical system with bleeding, bandaging and breaking body parts
  • Realistic weapon and ammo management
  • Vehicles and AT weapons
  • Destructible buildings
  • Character customization with clothes, weapons, patches and more

Everything is subject to change and more features and content will be added for the game's eventual full release.

In order to host an online game, you need to port forward the port 7777. Once you start hosting a level, make sure not to start the game before all the other players have joined. Clients can join the host by using the host's public IPv4 address. It is recommended to play the game with up to 5 people, but the game technically supports up to 10 players on one server (try at your own risk).
